block.p: LEAD: Leslie Barbara Caust, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Melvin Caust of Lake Worth, Fla., was married yesterday to David Jerome Brazda, a son of Jane Brazda of Winchester, Va., and Jerome Brazda of Alexandria, Va. Cantor Bernard Fitch performed the ceremony at Le Chateau in South Salem, N.Y. Mrs. Brazda, 30 years old, is the director of executive services at Mastercard International in New York.

LEAD: Leslie Barbara Caust, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Melvin Caust of Lake Worth, Fla., was married yesterday to David Jerome Brazda, a son of Jane Brazda of Winchester, Va., and Jerome Brazda of Alexandria, Va. Cantor Bernard Fitch performed the ceremony at Le Chateau in South Salem, N.Y. Mrs. Brazda, 30 years old, is the director of executive services at Mastercard International in New York.

Leslie Barbara Caust, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Melvin Caust of Lake Worth, Fla., was married yesterday to David Jerome Brazda, a son of Jane Brazda of Winchester, Va., and Jerome Brazda of Alexandria, Va. Cantor Bernard Fitch performed the ceremony at Le Chateau in South Salem, N.Y. Mrs. Brazda, 30 years old, is the director of executive services at Mastercard International in New York. She is a graduate of Vassar College where she was elected to Phi Beta Kappa. The bridegroom, 35, is the director of marketing and sales at the Mallory Factor public relations company in New York. He is a graduate of George Mason University and the Circle in the Square Graduate Theater Program in New York.
